name: Sexpinion
tag_list: social-network, sex-education, sex-ed, health, advice, qa, aggregator, curated-content
overview:
Sexpinion is a social network for sex & dating advice.

Description: Sexpinion.com helps consumers research sexual health and intimacy topics including STDs, birth control, adult toys, and sexual function; find solutions to their questions or offer answers to those posed by others; and purchase products and services curated by Celebrity Sexperts.

On Sexpinion, you’ll find: •Online access to the best sexperts. We are your go-to guide for sex advice. Ask questions publically or anonymously, or just browse. •Platform to educate and empower. Everyone’s a sexpert. Show off your knowledge and gain credibility by answering questions and sharing quality content. •Celebrity curated experiences. Our Celebrity Sexperts share their favorite tips, products and services to help you make your sex life incredible. •Member rewards. Get rewarded for sharing your sexpinion. Users providing quality answers or posting highly shared content are rewarded with points. These points can be used for credits towards products or services on Sexpinion.

Our Philosophy: Sexpinion is a safe and open community, free of judgment to share ideas and questions on sexuality and sexual intimacy.

Sexpinion is not a Pinterest for porn, that’s sex.com. We created Sexpinion to fill the void seen in sexual education and acceptance by providing a safe and open community free of judgment to curate ideas and questions on sexual health, intimacy, products and news. Our easy to use interface encourages users to share their sexpinions, which can be in the form of questions, articles, images or products. Through this open dialog we hope to educate and empower both men and women to be sexually confident, healthy and happy. Sexpinion is a community that accepts all creeds, races, genders and sexualities and asks that those who enter here come with this same respect.
